entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
